required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial of SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine (Vero Cells), Inactivated in Healthy Population Aged 3 to 17 Years(COVID-19)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Phase Ⅰ Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine (Vero Cells), Inactivated in Healthy Population Aged 3 to 17 Years

lead_sponsor.agency: Shenzhen Kangtai Biological Products Co., LTD

collaborator.agency: Hunan Province Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

clinical_study.source: Shenzhen Kangtai Biological Products Co., LTD

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a randomized, double-blinded, and placebo controlled phase Ⅰ clinical trial of the SARS-CoV-2 inactivated vaccine to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of the experimental vaccine in healthy population aged 3 to 17 years.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of abnormal indicators of laboratory safety examinations(including blood routine, blood biochemistry, urine routine, thyroid function and coagulation function)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 3 after each dose of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric mean titer of SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 28 days, 3 months, 6 months and 12 months post full vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric mean titer of SARS-CoV-2 IgG binding antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 28 days, 3 months, 6 months and 12 months post full vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Seroconversion rate of SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody
Seroconversion rate of SARS-CoV-2 IgG binding antibody
Seropositive rate of SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 months, 6 months and 12 months post full vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Seropositive rate of SARS-CoV-2 IgG binding antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 months, 6 months and 12 months post full vaccination

intervention.description: 2 doses of SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine (Vero Cells), Inactivated should be administered as an intramuscular injection into the lateral deltoid of the upper arm with a 28-day interval.
2 doses of Placebo should be administered as an intramuscular injection into the lateral deltoid of the upper arm with a 28-day interval.

facility.name: Hunan Provincial Center for Diseases Control and Prevention
